name: Fargerfight Pong
description:
A more polished remake of Pongcerto I made to teach myself Unity after a long hiatus from gamedev.

Inherently a classic Pong, in which players can break the opponent's paddle for an advantage. Or just play it the old-fashioned way without the mumbo jumbo.

Sound design was done by me and recycled from profectus.4.

Source on github.
